role.title: Senior Backend Engineer
role.summary: Design and build scalable backend services powering Acme's logistics platform.
role.description:
We are looking for a Senior Backend Engineer to join our Platform team in Berlin. You will design, build, and operate high-throughput microservices that power Acme's real-time logistics network. You will work closely with product, data, and infrastructure teams to deliver reliable, scalable systems that handle millions of events per day.

Key responsibilities:
- Architect and implement backend services in Go
- Design and optimize PostgreSQL schemas and queries
- Build event-driven pipelines using Kafka
- Mentor junior engineers and contribute to technical strategy
- Participate in on-call rotation (1 week per quarter)

organization.name: Acme Corp
organization.description: Acme Corp is a Series B logistics technology company building the operating system for last-mile delivery across Europe.

experience.description: At least 5 years of professional backend development experience.

other: Previous work in logistics or supply chain domain

bonus.details: Performance-based annual bonus up to EUR 5,000.

benefits.details: Covers dental, vision, and specialist visits.

benefits.description: MacBook Pro and ergonomic home-office setup.
Full salary top-up during parental leave for up to 6 months.

growth.career_path: Senior Engineer → Staff Engineer → Principal Engineer. Leadership track also available (Engineering Manager).

stages.name: Application Review
stages.description: CV and cover letter reviewed by hiring manager. Response within 5 business days.

stages.name: Intro Call
stages.description: 30-minute video call with a recruiter to discuss the role, expectations, and your background.

stages.name: Technical Interview
stages.description: 60-minute live coding session focused on Go, system design, and problem solving.

stages.name: System Design Deep-Dive
stages.description: Whiteboard session designing a distributed system relevant to our domain.

stages.name: Culture & Values
stages.description: Conversation about collaboration, communication, and alignment with company values.

stages.name: Offer
stages.description: Verbal offer followed by written contract within 2 business days.

culture.work_style: We are a low-meeting, high-autonomy team. Engineers own features end-to-end from design to production. We ship small increments frequently and rely on async communication for most decisions.
culture.dei_statement: Acme Corp is an equal opportunity employer. We actively seek to create a diverse and inclusive environment and encourage applications from all backgrounds.
